text: is in Kitaky큰sh큰 ward, Kitaky큰sh큰, Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan. It is often called for short. This school has general course and science and mathematics course. The science and mathematics course is certified as SSH by Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, and Technology. This school is considered as top and high reputable school in this area. == Outline == Most Yahata High School students apply and get through the examination of the national university. This school has one of the top reputations among public high schools in Kitakyushu city (along with Touchiku High School and Kokura High School) because a large number of graduates continue on to National University, for example, Kyusyu University, one of the top public universities in Japan. == History == Fukuoka High School was founded in 1919 under the former Japanese educational system in which children went directly to high school after graduating from elementary school. == References == Category:High schools in Japan Category:1919 establishments in Asia Category:1910s establishments in Japan
title: Fukuoka Prefectural Yahata High School
